thread.title: Resolve software group unveils new logo
thread.title_full: Resolve software group unveils new logo

author: webmaster@whatech.com.au (Kate McKenzie)
title: Resolve software group unveils new logo
text:
Published on Friday, 11 September 2015 14:47 Submitted by Kate McKenzie WhaTech Premium Legacy News from: Resolve Software Group - Dynamic Case Management Page views: 1 times Resolve Software Group, leading provider of Dynamic Case Management software solutions, today unveiled a new visual identity, headed up by the introduction of a new corporate logo that signifies its growth and transformation, and celebrates the culture of innovation built over the company’s 21-year history. - Advertisement - 
“The launch of our new visual identity kicks off a new era at Resolve Software Group and speaks to who we are as a company – modern and evolving,” said Chris Morison, CEO, Resolve Software Group (RSG). RSG has excelled in its chosen the market since its single product offering was first introduced in 2000. 
Today, RSG is charting a new course in Dynamic Case Management with its expanded suite of products, solutions and services. It was time for the company’s visual identity to reflect that. 
The new visual identity, with a blue rather than red colour scheme, takes on a much fresher and more vibrant look, which better reflects the company’s personality and direction towards cloud solutions. 
“The new logo represents our strength in numbers; combining smaller elements to create a sum greater than the parts – be that our people or our products,” said Morison. “Its design is mathematic in nature and gives the assurance of precision and accuracy – values we stand for as a company. 
The corporate logo also utilises "Resolve Software Group" in its entirety as a way to distinguish the corporate identity from its flagship software brand. - Advertisement - 
Along with the new corporate logo, RSG has launched new product logos for Resolve Enterprise and Resolve CloudBase. Honouring the brand’s rich heritage, an updated version of the “Resolve tick” – a symbol that has represented the company since 2000 – will be still play its part. 
The new more abstract tick will used across RSG product portfolio. 
The new visual identity will be rolled out to the company’s products, documentation, and online presence over the coming weeks. For more information:
